title._content: [Massaponax Church, Va. "Council of War": Gen. Ulysses S. Grant examining map held by Gen. George G. Meade during the Civil War] (LOC)

description._content: Raymond, Matt. [Massaponax Church, Va. "Council of War": Gen. Ulysses S. Grant examining map held by Gen. George G. Meade during the Civil War] 2011. 1 photograph : digital, TIFF file. Notes: Anaglyph stereograph made from digital images of a pair of stereograph negatives by Timothy O'Sullivan in May 1864. (Call number: LC-B811-730, left half -- hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cwpb.01192 and right half-- hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cwpb.01191) Title devised by Library staff. Gift; Matt Raymond; 2011; (DLC/PP-2011:076). Subjects: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. Format: Digital photographs--2000-2010. Anaglyphs--2000-2010. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppbd.00362 Call Number: LC-DIG-ppbd- 00362

note._content: This guy! WOW .. Im so glad I had some 3d glasses handy. this is awesome stuff.
